headline: Amazon's Lost Puppy Super Bowl Commercial Backfires: 'Get This Creepy Technology Away From Our Homes'
summary: A Super Bowl commercial from Amazon has faced backlash and led to the company cancelling a planned partnership for its Ring segment.
